data.taskTitle: show resumable session count badge on /tasks project
summary: Added RecoverableSession interface and state variable
Added fetchRecoverableSessions() function to fetch from /api/recovery
Added getProjectRecoverableCount() helper to count sessions per project
Modified fetchAllData() to include recovery data fetching
Added resumable count badge to project tabs with orange/amber styling

data.taskTitle: show resumable session count badge on /tasks project
summary: Changed badge text from Xrez to X paused on /tasks page project tabs
Added Pause action to StatusActionBadge dropdown for working, needs-input, and ready-for-review session states
Updated RecoveryWidget terminology from Crashed Sessions to Paused Sessions
Changed Resume button text for consistency

data.taskTitle: show resumable session count badge on /tasks project
summary: Implemented instant signal pattern for session state transitions
Added working signal on resume action
Added starting signal on start action
Added auto-proceeding signal on start-next action
Updated signal API to write directly to files for instant feedback
